abstract: German authorities thwart attack on Eschborn-to-Frankfurt professional cycling race, arresting Turkish-German man and his wife and seizing weapons, pipe bomb and chemicals used to make explosives found in their Oberursel home.
lead_paragraph: German authorities seized a cache of weapons, including a pipe bomb, and chemicals that can be used to make explosives when they raided a home outside Frankfurt.

headline.main: Germany: Officials Say They Foiled Plot for Attack on Professional Cycling Race
headline.print_headline: Europe; Germany: Officials Say They Foiled Plot for Attack on Professional Cycling Race

snippet: German authorities seized a cache of weapons, including a pipe bomb, and chemicals that can be used to make explosives when they raided a home outside Frankfurt.
